backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Brain Dump–related features, their files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to brief functional descriptions for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Single wrapper component that renders FocusExecutionApp.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskModal.tsx: Modal for manually adding tasks with fields for title, why, energy category, steps, and estimate.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpView.ts: Brain Dump interface that converts draft text to categorized items, supports speech-to-text, and syncs draft/items externally.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCategorySe: Selector UI for choosing among four energy levels with icons and highlighting.
Button that triggers a callback to return to the home focus view.
frontend/src/components/TaskEnergyAssist: React UI component that collects a task description, classifies its energy category, and displays chat-style interactions with suggestions.
frontend/src/FocusExecutionApp.jsx: Main application component handling tasks, backlog, energy, Brain Dump storage, timers, and UI view logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status tracking, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom hook wrapping browser speech recognition to provide transcript text, listening controls, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining fonts, warm color variables, dark mode values, and utility animations.
Local parser that extracts individual task strings from freeform text using rules for bullets, connectors, speech patterns, and task splitting.
frontend/src/lib/taskEnergyClassifier.ts: Implements a local keyword- and pattern-based classifier to assign tasks an energy category with confidence and explanation. Includes scoring logic based on keywords, complexity, and time estimates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s saved state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the Focus & Execution Management System.
